channel.title: The "Mandarin" bots
channel.description:
I saw your threads on the bots you all have named "Mandarin" bots.
I believe they are not java edits.
I believe they have existed for a long time.
It is possible to have a undectable color clicker that dosn't use the mouse or computer screen, I am coding one right now.
neonknight mentioned this 2 weeks ago. Impossible to break the new engine in a week. Therefore i imagine their bot is similar to the one i am making. [img]http://www.impsoft.net/pic/neon.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted at: June 02, 2006, 10:14:55 pm[/size][hr]full gaim log for the nousy
http://www.impsoft.net/pic/2006-05-20.224903-0400EDT.html

item.title: The "Mandarin" bots
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

ruler:

locked

DAMNIT stupid permissions, I made it where regular members cant lock posts, but I guess I forgot about community members :o

I will leave it locked however, because its turning into a flamefest, and there is already another topic to talk about this in

[me=moparisthebest]fixes it where community members can't lock threads ;D[/me]

Read full topic

item.title: The "Mandarin" bots
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

ya they made a bot in week... ah no.

Did you even read his post?

. Someone I will bet money made a bot that was one of those things that uses the loader instead of runescape.jar a good while ago and I will bet you it just never crashed during the updates.

Read full topic

item.title: The "Mandarin" bots
item.dc:creator: @Wenakko Wenakko
item.description:
@Wenakko wrote:

ruler:

[quote author=93dcthugs93 link=topic=4290.msg43176#msg43176 date=1149358455]
People this whole thread seems like ignorance. It's not impossible to make a bot currently. Extentions, injections, and many other ways of creating a bot still do exsist as they always have. Someone I will bet money made a bot that was one of those things that uses the loader instead of runescape.jar a good while ago and I will bet you it just never crashed during the updates. I doubt it's a SCAR script. I bet a group of people came together with money and paid a team of programmers to make this for them or mabey they made it on thier own. To worry about how someone else is autoing is a waste of time. Why not instead figure out your own way to do so.

ya they made a bot in week... ah no.[/quote]

I wouldn't doubt it

Read full topic

item.title: The "Mandarin" bots
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

idk the possiblity of a bot being made in a week is very unliky but i bet it could be done problem with cheating communities these days is theirs no real unity if you think about it rs cheating started as a few small groups coming together thats not to say their were not differences, because everyone cant like everyone but still the communitys where more united back in the day than they are now

Read full topic
